text: Overblown may mean: *a word related to exaggerated *"Overblown", a Mudhoney song on Singles: Original Motion Picture Soundtrack *Overblown (book), the book Overblown: How Politicians and the Terrorism Industry Inflate National Security Threats, and Why We Believe Them by American political scientist John E. Mueller ==See also== *Overblowing, changing a whistle or wind instrument's pitch by increasing air pressure
title: Overblown
